# Edit ROI & Consent

Views: 

**ROI ( Release of Information)** – Allows the SkilledTradesBC to release information regarding an apprentice to the authorized representative. 

**Consent** – Allows the SkilledTradesBC to release information to the authorized representative and the authorized representative can edit/update the apprentice’s information. 

Navigate to My Profile in the SkilledTradesBC portal. 

![](https://portal.skilledtradesbc.ca/knowledgebase/KB-edit_roi_consent_1.jpg)

Click on the **“Eye”** icon under **View/ Edit**. 

![](https://portal.skilledtradesbc.ca/knowledgebase/KB-edit_roi_consent_2.jpg)

The Representative’s information is displayed.   
  
Click **Update** to edit the information. 

![](https://portal.skilledtradesbc.ca/knowledgebase/KB-edit_roi_consent_3.jpg)

Edit the information.   
  
Click **Submit**. 

![](https://portal.skilledtradesbc.ca/knowledgebase/KB-edit_roi_consent_4.jpg)

Keywords: ROI, consent, SkilledTradesBC portal, apprentice, quick guide
